title: King Vipers LF Coach
body:
King Vipers are looking for a coach to assist in Summoners Oceanic Series (Top 8 teams in sum soc tournaments)

Requirments 
- Ability to run a draft
- Understanding of meta and meta shifts
- indepth champion knowledge 

For more info or to apply please contact us via one of the below methods

Discord: KV J4M3S #9977
LoL: KV Cola
